# Research: rename-5-plans

## Context

- Goal: Identify all existing 5-PLAN.md files under .github/plans/\*\* and prepare a one-time migration plan to rename them to 5-TASKS.md.
- Stakeholders: Maintainers of Vibe Flow agent suite.
- Audience: plan-writer/implement agents and repo maintainers.

### Architectural notes

- The active plan notes the current standard is 5-TASKS.md and older plan folders still include 5-PLAN.md files.
- All current 5-PLAN.md files are confined to .github/plans/ and are either in-progress or complete plans.

### Hotspots / risk areas

- Avoid modifying historical content beyond file rename.
- Ensure no non-plan files are touched.
- Preserve existing file content and metadata; only rename filenames.

## External Discovery

### Links & evidence

- No external sources required for this one-time repository migration.

## Recommendation

- Recommendation: Perform a one-time rename of all 5-PLAN.md files under .github/plans/\*\* to 5-TASKS.md.
- Rationale: Aligns legacy plan folders with the standardized task file name while preserving historical content.
